overview: Carlos (42) and Darío (18), father and son, go together to play five-a-side football, but there is nothing for the game. On and off the court, Carlos seeks to impose himself with his word and rough play. Darío carries the ball with skill and uses silence to avoid the harassment of his father, always unhappy with his way of being. Surrounded by men competing with each other, Darío watches and searches for himself. There is still time to choose another path.
title: No hay lugar
